document_data.caption: A map showing the Mistcliffs in northwest Chult.
document_data.name: Mistcliff Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mistcliffs''', also known as the '''Mistcliff Mountains''', was a mountain range that spanned the northwestern coast of [[Chult]].
document_data.Inhabitants:
As of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, the Mistcliffs were home to one of only four major colonies of [[aarakocra]] in all of [[Faerûn]].

By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the aarakocra population had grown several large settlements across the coastal [[Mistcliff]]. [[Pteranodon]]s and [[quetzalcoatlus]]es were also known to make their home within the range's jagged peaks.
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Mistcliff]]: The eponymous cliffside that faced the sea.
